# Cartographie
```{ojs}
//| echo: false
//| padding: 0px
//| expandable: false
//| fill: true


map = {
  const container = html`<div class="map-container" id="map" style="height: 720px; width: 100%;"></div>`;
  yield container;

  const sourcePlanIGN = {
    style: 'normal',
    format: 'image/png',
    layer: 'GEOGRAPHICALGRIDSYSTEMS.PLANIGNV2'
  };

  const sourceOrtho = {
    style: 'normal',
    format: 'image/jpeg',
    layer: 'HR.ORTHOIMAGERY.ORTHOPHOTOS'
  };

  const map = new maplibregl.Map({
    container: container,
    style: 'https://basemaps.cartocdn.com/gl/voyager-gl-style/style.json',  // Utiliser ce style initialement
    center: [-0.58979, 44.83449],  // Nouvelle-Aquitaine
    zoom: 11
  });

  map.addControl(new maplibregl.FullscreenControl(), 'top-right');
  map.addControl(new maplibregl.NavigationControl({ visualizePitch: true }), 'top-left');
  map.addControl(new maplibregl.ScaleControl({ maxWidth: 80, unit: 'metric' }));
}
```
